PACKAG 
 IDENT main
SCOLON 
  FUNC 
 IDENT main
LPAREN 
RPAREN 
LPAREN 
RPAREN 
LBRACE 
   VAR 
 IDENT s
LBRACK 
RBRACK 
   I32 i32
SCOLON 
   VAR 
 IDENT INIT_HEAP_SIZE
   I32 i32
  ASGN =
INTLIT 32
 MULOP *
LPAREN 
INTLIT 1
LEFTOP 
INTLIT 20
RPAREN 
SCOLON 
   FOR 
 IDENT i
CASSGN :=
INTLIT 0
SCOLON 
 IDENT i
  LTOP <
 IDENT INIT_HEAP_SIZE
SCOLON 
 IDENT i
 INCOP 
LBRACE 
 IDENT s
  ASGN =
 IDENT append
LPAREN 
 IDENT s
 COMMA 
INTLIT 1
RPAREN 
SCOLON 
RBRACE 
SCOLON 
 IDENT test
LPAREN 
 IDENT len
LPAREN 
 IDENT s
RPAREN 
 COMMA 
 IDENT INIT_HEAP_SIZE
 COMMA 
STRLIT 
RPAREN 
SCOLON 
RBRACE 
SCOLON
